function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of awareness and knowledge about COVID-19 mitigation and early detection","Impact":"Increased COVID-19 cases in Indonesia","Mitigation":"Public education and awareness campaigns, distribution of informational materials","Technologies":"Expert system for early detection, GIS for mapping","People":"Indonesian population, especially those unaware of mitigation measures","Owner":"Health authorities, government, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Inaccurate risk assessment and detection platform","Impact":"Misidentification of COVID-19 risk levels","Mitigation":"Regular validation and updating of detection platform, integration of multiple data sources","Technologies":"Expert system for early detection, GIS for mapping, web scraping techniques","People":"Users of the detection platform, public health officials","Owner":"Health authorities, developers of the detection platform"},{"Description":"Inadequate tracking of COVID-19 patient presence","Impact":"Difficulty in tracking and managing the spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Development of patient tracking features, integration with GIS for visualization","Technologies":"Geographic Information System (GIS), patient tracking features","People":"Public, healthcare providers","Owner":"Health authorities, developers of the tracking system"}]}
